text: Hi <@U2H3TT8F2>, any updates on this? One of our customers is experiencing the same issue.
This was a user permissions issue. I would see if the person who is making the request to update has “super admin” permissions. If they do and are still getting this error, please let me know.

Hey, how we can improve the server response time on HubSpot.
So that our page can load fast.
